author: warlock00
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
dir -<ctrl+space>
```

Expected behavior
-----------------
```none
Inverted text colour only on current item as you move around making your selection.
```

Actual behavior
---------------
```none
Inverted colour doesn't revert to gray on black leaving an ugly trail of black on gray.

I've also seen this issue in 6.0.1 and 6.0.2
```
![img](https://i.imgur.com/hWo8qn2.png "img")

Environment data
----------------

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable

PSVersion                      6.1.0-preview.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.1.0-preview.1

PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}

WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: Intellisense in console not clearing selected item's inverted text colour as you move.
